    • of

      public static BankId of(Configuration configuration)
      Returns a BankId with the given configuration.
      Parameters:
      configuration - the configuration
      Returns:
      an BankId instance

    • authenticate

      public AuthenticateResponse authenticate(@NonNull @NonNull AuthenticationRequest request)
      Initiates an authentication order.

      Use the collect method to query the status of the order. If the request is successful, the orderRef and autoStartToken is returned.

      Parameters:
      request - the authentication request
      Throws:
      BankIdException - in case of an error

    • authenticateAsync

      public CompletableFuture<AuthenticateResponse> authenticateAsync(@NonNull @NonNull AuthenticationRequest request)
      Initiates an authentication order asynchronous.

      Use the collect method to query the status of the order. If the request is successful, the orderRef and autoStartToken is returned.

      Propagates BankIdException in case of error.

      Parameters:
      request - the authentication request

    • phoneAuthenticate

      public PhoneAuthenticateResponse phoneAuthenticate(@NonNull @NonNull PhoneAuthenticationRequest request)
      Initiates an authentication order when the user is talking to the RP over the phone.

      Use the collect method to query the status of the order. If the request is successful, the orderRef and autoStartToken is returned.

      Parameters:
      request - the authentication request
      Throws:
      BankIdException - in case of an error

    • phoneAuthenticateAsync

      public CompletableFuture<PhoneAuthenticateResponse> phoneAuthenticateAsync(@NonNull @NonNull PhoneAuthenticationRequest request)

      Use the collect method to query the status of the order. If the request is successful, the orderRef and autoStartToken is returned.

      Parameters:
      request - the authentication request
      Throws:
      BankIdException - in case of an error

    • collect

      public CollectResponse collect(@NonNull @NonNull CollectRequest request)
      Collects the result of a sign or auth order suing the orderRef as reference.

      RP should keep calling collect every two seconds as long as status indicates pending. RP must abort if status indicates failed. The user identity is returned when complete.

      Parameters:
      request - the collect request
      Throws:
      BankIdException - in case of an error

    • collectAsync

      public CompletableFuture<CollectResponse> collectAsync(@NonNull @NonNull CollectRequest request)
      Collects the result of a sign or auth order suing the orderRef as reference asynchronous.

      RP should keep calling collect every two seconds as long as status indicates pending. RP must abort if status indicates failed. The user identity is returned when complete.

      Propagates BankIdException in case of error.

      Parameters:
      request - the collect request

    • cancel

      public CancelResponse cancel(@NonNull @NonNull CancelRequest request)
      Cancels an ongoing sign or auth order.

      This is typically used if the user cancels the order in your service or app.

      Parameters:
      request - the cancel request
      Throws:
      BankIdException - in case of an error

    • cancelAsync

      public CompletableFuture<CancelResponse> cancelAsync(@NonNull @NonNull CancelRequest request)
      Cancels an ongoing sign or auth order.

      This is typically used if the user cancels the order in your service or app.

      Propagates BankIdException in case of error.

      Parameters:
      request - the cancel request
